description: GitCommit is a free Python based script that does a few checks before running git commit -av. Checks include running django unit tests and checking for TODO statements. To contribute, visit httpgithub.comdefcubegitcommit
longdescription: GitCommit is a free Python based script that does a few checks before running git commit -av. Checks include running django unit tests and checking for TODO statements. To contribute, visit httpgithub.comdefcubegitcommit
